import React, { useState } from "react"; function Navbar() { const [showLinks, setShowLinks] = useState(false); const toggleLinks = () => { setShowLinks(!showLinks); }; const styles = { nav: { position: "fixed", top: 0, left: 0, width: "100%", color: "#fff", }, navCenter: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", height: "60px", padding: "0 1rem", }, toggleBtn: { backgroundColor: "transparent", border: "none", outline: "none", cursor: "pointer", fontSize: "1.5rem", color: "#fff", }, navLinks: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", position: "fixed", top: 60, left: 0, width: "100%", height: "calc(100% - 60px)", backgroundColor: "#222", transition: "transform 0.3s ease-in-out", transform: showLinks ? "translateY(0)" : "translateY(-100%)", }, link: { display: "block", padding: "1rem 0", color: "#fff", fontSize: "1.2rem", textAlign: "center", transition: "color 0.2s ease-in-out", textDecoration: "none", }, }; return (

); } export default Navbar;
